name: NETXP LINUX kde4 Process Execution
description: Monitors executions of certain kde4 processes, contributing to user account security. This rule helps in tracking activities related to the KDE desktop environment, identifying any unusual or unauthorized processes that may impact user account security.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "T1078_Valid_Accounts" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
